name: Arrakis: Revenge
description:
Do you remember the legendary game "Dune 2"? Yeah, it's that game where annoying sandworms all time eat your harvesters. Unacceptable! So, you killed them. All of them. So many sandworms were a victim of your rage. But now.. time for Revenge.

This time you - a sandworm. Choose desirable controls and game difficulty mode - and go ahead to eat that many harvesters as you can!

Cover image: Mahiel Standhavdt | Arian Stoetzer | arianvision.nl
